page.title: 16TRANSPORT
page.content: Some work places use minibuses to ferry employees to and from their villages. CARS Most families own a car, some more than one. Where both parents are working in different places two cars are needed as public transport is inadequate. OTHER PRIVATE TRANSPORT Motor cycles, mopeds, motor scooters, and pedal cycles are also used by people to get to work or for pleasure. Most children have bicycles. AIR TRAVEL The nearest airport is at Norwich (25 miles) with flights to other British airports and Amsterdam.
